dimensions: 115 x 246 x 116 mm (H x W x D)
selftimer: - 2 seconds - 5 seconds - 10 seconds - 20 seconds - 1 to 9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2 or 3 seconds
accessoriesincluded: - Monitor cover BM-12 - Body cap BF-1B - Rechargeable Li-ion battery EN-EL15 with terminal cover - Battery charger MH-25a - USB cable clip - HDMI cable clip - USB cable UC-E22 - Strap AN-DC12
effects: - Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape, Flat - Selected Picture Control can be modified - Storage for custom Picture Controls
otherfeatures: - High-fidelity audio control - Multi-area D-Movie - Split-screen display zoom
shutterspeed: - 1/8000 to 30 s in steps of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV - Bulb - Time - X250
whitebalance: - Auto (2 types), incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual (up to 6 values can be stored, spot white balance measurement available during live view), choose colour temperature (2500 K to 10000 K) - All feature fine-tuning
cleaning: - Image sensor cleaning - Image Dust Off reference data (requires Capture NX-D software)
